channel.title: Travel on Laurent Smeets
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Laurent Smeets

item.title: Countries Visited Animated GIF
item.description: Introduction Since I am planning on using some gg_animate gifs for my thesis, it seemed like a good idea to start with a small project. This gif shows the countries I have visited thus far in order (or so I think, I haven’t gone through the photo albums yet). A lot of the code was inspired by this Github page. However, I did use the latest gg_animate grammar. Countries that I visited more than once, only show up the first time I visited them.
